pointer for app icons
cleanup
added ignores
small styling fixes

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/xsltforms
app.title: XSLTForms Files
app.author: Alain Couthures
app.description: This library contains revision 594 of XSLTForms, from 2014-04-16.

ul.li: fixing falsy is-newer check again
removed dependency on console module
fixed is-never call to compare the names of the respective app instead of the abbrev. This fails if the apps abbrev changes but the actual app is the same.
fixed a bug with icon retrieval
added endpoint for accessing public url
small fixes to make svg icons work
changed ordering of items inside of repo-app element
changed order of subitems in repo-app element (repo-icon always first now for ease of client-side processing)
removed slot attributes from repo-icon elements
fixed request context pathes
block packagemanager and packageservice from being removed
support for svg icons
check for newer packages, putting updated packages on top of list
fixed html empty elements by using HTML5 serialization
showing dummy page in case service is opened directly

app.title: EXPath File Transfer Client Module Demos

app.name: http://existsolutions.com/apps/tei-publisher-lib
app.title: TEI Publisher: Processing Model Libraries
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.note: Generated apps may fail after updating. Run .../myapp/modules/lib/regenerate.xql in browser or eXide once to update your ODDs.

ul.li: Renditions defined in tei header were no longer applied
Support definition of default elementSpec for elements and text nodes
FO output: make sure to not produce an empty destination for internal and external links
Fix internal references for LaTeX output
Apply class to line breaks so they can be stiled via CSS

app.name: http://xqilla.sourceforge.net/pkg/xqjson
app.title: JSON Parser and Serializer for XQuery
app.author: John Snelson
app.description: An XQuery module with functions for parsing and serializing JSON.

ul.li: With XQuery 3.1's robust native support of JSON parsing and serialization and eXist 3.0's support of XQuery 3.1, this package is no longer being maintained. Please upgrade to eXist 3.x and migrate your code to use XQuery 3.1 instead of this package.
Fixed bugs, added a comprehensive test suite, and added examples to the README.
Fixed bugs where extra commas appeared in serialized JSON

app.author: Dannes Wessels

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/shared
app.title: Shared Resources: jquery, dojo, ace ...
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.description: Shared resources used by other apps

ul.li: Move site-wide CSS to shared-resources. Modularize design using less.
Added bootstrap
Bug fixes and minor improvements in templating
Updated ace
Small syntax error in templates.xql
Externalised parameter value resolution in templating. Now useable outside XQuery URL Rewrite context.
Updated ace
Fixed permission checks in dbutil module: functions should not fail if user lacks the permission to browse into a collection.
Updated ace
Fixed templates:surround to report a proper error if a template could not be found.
No release notes prepared for this version.
No release notes prepared for this version.
Fixed templates:each to not output empty element.
Improved HTML output by stripping data-template attributes unless configuration option "debug" is set to true.
Aligned limit of template:resolve to the max arity number in templates:call-with-args.
Fixed for erroneous return type from two functions in apputil module affecting package installation.
Minor release to restore package/@abbrev value to prevent problems on older systems querying public-repo.
New: Template functions can now accept an arbitrary number of parameters, previously limited to 15 - #29
New: Templates can be loaded from HTTP and HTTPS URLs - #24
Fixed: Build problems - #28

app.author: Claudius Teodorescu

ul.li: fixes issue #7 - info button does not work on webkit browsers
added components for meta-information elements (repo-elements)
reinstated update badge
layout fixes
removed paper-badge elements
controller fixes and refinements
using central toast now for messaging
error handling for install errors
new layout using tabs
responsiveness improvements
new app icon
logout configurable - can be removed from menu
re-added iron-meta (used by other components)
cleaned up iron-meta
responsiveness improvements
migrated to use repo-elements
layout refinements for readability and responsiveness
fixed tagging
preventing PackageManager and PackageService from being de-installed.
added error handling for 200 responses
minor refinements to login
showing toast message on local page when updates are available
progressbar for remove action
defined dependency on existdb-packageservice 1.0.0
fixed bug: apps opening 2 times for a single click on icon or title
styling of updated packages
completed ported to Polymer 2 class-style components
keyboard shortcuts
updated vaadin-upload component
fixed version number in package.json
fixed svg icon styling
added missing version number to bower.json
added changelog
removed unstable key binding for up and down arrow
replaced neon-animated-pages with iron-pages for stability
detail layout enhancements
fixed missing activation of packages when clicking app title for installed apps
ported to Polymer 2 hybrid mode
removed tab navigation. Replaced by '+' button
keyboard shortcut support
improved filtering
moved upload to top of screen for better accessibility
improved keyboard navigation of packages

app.title: XProc Calabash Module

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/dashboard
app.title: Dashboard
app.author: Joern Turner
Wolfgang Meier
app.note: If you are updating the dashboard, you may need to bypass the browser's cache (and cookies). On most browsers, hold Ctrl (IE) or Shift (Firefox, Safari, Chrome) and click the reload button.

ul.li: Package Manager: Display change log for updated packages and show size of installable package
Small improvements to backup plugin
Fixed too dark background on IE
Fixed xhr issues in dashboard-1.7.js
Fixed and Enabled the UserManager plugin
Small fixes
Allow an XQuery to be killed from scheduler plugin
Package manager: move packages for which updates are available to the top of the package list.
Read/Write/Execute and SetUID, SetGID and Sticky bits can be set/unset from Collection Browser
Display ACL ACEs Collection Browser
Release for eXist-db 2.2
Removal of link to old web admin
Adopt correct syntax for empty-sequence node test, supported from eXist-db 4.0.0
Remove user manager: there's now a separate package, which actually works
Remove scheduler: its functionality is already available in monex
Hotfix release to enable users of eXist 3.6.1-or-lower to upgrade to 4.0.0
New major version to signal break in compatibility with pre-eXist 4.0.0 Dashboard
Fixed: Removed "Remember me" checkbox from login dialog to workaround problem - #64

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/public-repo
app.title: eXist-db Public Application Repository
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.description: Scripts to maintain eXist's public application repository.

ul.li: Allow processor version to end with a label, for compatibility with eXist 3.1.0+ semver scheme.
Fixed links in atom feed by including min-version parameter.
Fixed error affecting view of packages requiring different processor versions.
Fixed issue with version number data type processing.
New admin section to upload packages and publish them.
Fixed auto-upload.xql to consider only the xar type files.
Added support for automatic updating of apps.xml in case one adds, updates, or deletes a xar file from public folder.
Updated atom feed entries to link to each app's html page
Changed homepage display from grid to list, with separate detailed view for each package
Added display of change log to atom feed and detailed web view
Improved the display of search results in the content extraction demo.
Fixed RESTXQ and AngularJS demo.
Removed dependency on JSONXQ library, replaced with XQuery 3.1 JSON facility.

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/mallet-topic-modeling
app.title: Mallet Topic Modeling for eXist-db
app.author: Leif-Jöran Olsson
app.description: Integrates the Mallet Topc Modeling library into eXist-db.

app.name: http://www.tei-c.org/tei-simple
app.title: TEI Processing Model Toolbox
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.description: TEI Processing Model Toolbox (superseded by TEI Publisher)

ul.li: NOTE: TEI Processing Model Toolbox has been superseded by TEI Publisher
This is a minor maintenance release to allow applications to migrate to TEI Publisher

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/tei-graphing
app.title: (TEI) Graphing for eXist-db
app.author: Leif-Jöran Olsson
app.description: (TEI) Graphing for eXist-db using libraries for dynamic visualization.

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/eXide
app.title: eXide - XQuery IDE
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.description: eXide - a web based XQuery IDE

ul.li: Fixed: Deletion of resources via DB Manager - #193
Fixed: Names of files uploaded via "Upload Directory" dialog included directory name and slash - #186
Fixed: Resources with certain characters could not be deleted via DB Manager - #187
Fixed: The app creation wizard could change permissions on collections above it - #188
Fixed: Link to emmet.js library included in the shared-resources app was incorrect - #189
Fixed: Handling of special characters in resource names - #183
New: Support "Snapshot" as a status in the app generator - #178
New: Do not suggest deprecated functions - #179
Updated: Links to eXide's GitHub repository - #144
Fixed: Restored the SetGID, SetUID, and sticky bit checkboxes in File > Manage permissions dialog
New: Support all native serialization methods in displaying query results, including eXist 3.3.0's new adaptive serialization
New: Add a toggle for indentation of query results
Fix download app to descend into collections
Fix serialization of query results with strings containing escaped characters
Fix the column that "Navigate" > "Go to line" goes to
Improve download app to prevent expansion of XIncludes
Improve error reported when trying to run tests not stored in the database
Removed package's semver-max to ensure compatibility with all eXist 3.x releases
Raise eXist dependency restrictions to allow compatibility with eXist 3.1
Add Adaptive Output mode handling for maps with a sequence of items as a value
New adaptive and JSON output options for query results
New checkbox to toggle highlighting of index hits
Fix function doc lookup
Various bug fixes
Keyboard shortcuts for copy and paste in file dialog
Type in file dialog to quickly jump to file
Fix scrolling of editor tabs if they do not fit on screen
Various small bug fixes
New collection tree view
Fix inline help for functions
When uploading many files, don't show them all to avoid browser crash
Fix display of query results: skip unnecessary namespace declarations
Fix word-left/word-right navigation
Add menu item to reset editor window layout to defaults
Keyboard shortcuts should now work in entire window, not just editor
Add shortcuts Alt-1 to 9 (windows, linux) and Ctrl-1 to 9 (mac) to quickly switch between tabs
Tabs can now be reordered with drag and drop
Added "Close-All" menu item
Remove size limits for documents which can be validated by the editor. Live error messages will be shown even for large documents/XQueries.
Fixed navigation in edit history.
Live reload: automatically reload the browser window running the app if resource is saved in editor.
Drag a file on the editor to open its contents in a new tab
Directory Uploads (Chrome only)
Fixed less support
Updated UI: now based on CSS3 flexbox
Properly restore cursor position for each editor when reloading. Switch to previously open editor tab.
"Goto definition" works on global variables as well
Added "go to last edit position" command to navigate back in history
Fix copy and paste
Lots of bug fixes
XML mode: new commands to expand selection to enclosing element; remove enclosing element
Updated templates to use bootstrap 3 (requires shared-resources-0.3.9)
Added feature to search across all binary resources (XQueries, Javascript, CSS) in a project
Many small bug fixes. In particular, there were display issues when browsing resources
Display of extended permissions in open/save dialogs
Editing of setuid, setgid and sticky bit permissions in Properties dialog
Added navigation shortcuts to quickly switch to buffer; navigate available commands
Use emmet for HTML/XML/CSS
Updates and bug fixes for ace, slick grid
Small fixes to variable completion
Experimental support for git.
Context-sensitive code completion
Refactoring: extract function/variable
Refactoring: rename function/variable/XML tag
Quick fixes and code hints
Show raw result of queries in embedded browser
And more ...
Improved outline view
Fixed quicksearch
Outline for CSS files
Set syntax to XQuery for code snippets passed in from demo app
Change indicator "*" not cleared properly after save
Fixed new app templates
Removed annoying log output
Updated code snippets

ul.li: layout and responsiveness fixes
added logout option
fixed missing dependency on functx
fixed scrolling bug in detail pages
added missing license file
fixes #11 + #15 Problems with running in Safari
replaced jquery/velocity dependency with simple CSS animation
fixes #13 - dependency on console module removed.
fixes the regex for allowed group names
fixes URL path issues with reconfigured jetty e.g. using '/' instead of '/exist'
fixes a bug with editing groups without members
version fix
fixed login
slightly changed layout and styling
seperated app container from actual usermanager component

app.name: http://exist-db.org/xquery/sparql
app.title: SPARQL and RDF indexing for eXist-db
app.author: eXist-db
app.description: SPARQL and RDF indexing for eXist-db

app.name: http://www.functx.com
app.title: FunctX library
app.author: Priscilla Walmsley
app.description: The FunctX XQuery/XSLT 2.0 function library is a set of reusable functions for XQuery 1.0 and XSLT 2.0. The project itself is an open source application and framework for developers to create function libraries.

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/doc
app.title: eXist-db Documentation
app.author: eXist-db
app.license: GNU Lesser General Public License, version 2.1
app.note: Note for users of eXist 2.x: When upgrading, please make sure you also updated the shared-resources package to > 0.4.0.

app.name: http://existsolutions.com/apps/tei-publisher
app.title: TEI Publisher
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.note: Generated apps may fail after updating. Run .../myapp/modules/lib/regenerate.xql in browser or eXide once to update your ODDs.

ul.li: add language selector
exclude nested divs in search to get more correct search results
fix wrong page displayed when viewing search results in paged view
fix error when navigating back in browser history after search
fix parsing of processing instruction: depth and fill should be numbers
correct offset when scrolling to highlighted search result
support copy&paste in odd editor
adds a visual editor for processing models
support for formatting non-TEI documents (see the documentation, which is now in docbook)
Improved responsiveness: navigation and toc work on mobile viewer
Drop /works prefix from document paths to simplify URLs
Renditions defined in tei header were no longer applied
Fix image resolving for generated apps
Allow documents to be deleted via UI
Include direct link to uploaded document

app.name: http://exist-db.org/couchbase
app.title: Couchbase driver
app.author: Dannes Wessels
app.description: The Couchbase Server driver extension for eXist-db provides access to functions and features of the Couchbase Server using the original Couchbase java client. This extension has NOT been developed by CouchBase and is therefore NOT an offical driver nor is it supported by CouchBase.
app.note: When upgrading: please first uninstall all previous versions and restart eXist-db.

ul.li: Another improvement on JSON conversion: Support of more datatypes.
Improved conversion of XQuery-JSON objects to Couchbase-JSON objects and vice versa.
Upgrade to Java driver version v2.4.3.

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/markdown
app.title: Markdown Parser in XQuery
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
app.description: A markdown parser written in XQuery.

ul.li: Add TEI output alongside original HTML output
Add support for task lists
Fix handling of quotes
Fix markdown module namespace prefix collision with metadata module
Allow markdown to occur inside HTML tags
Support HTML blocks and inline HTML

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/preconferece-2017
app.title: eXist-db XML Prague pre-conference meetup 2017
app.author: Dannes Wessels
Leif-Jöran Olsson
app.description: The eXist-db pre-conference is the traditional eXist-db users meeting during the XML Prague conference

app.name: http://exist-db.org/apps/monex
app.title: Monitoring and Profiling for eXist (Monex)
app.author: Wolfgang Meier
Joe Wicentowski
Lars Windauer
app.description: An application for monitoring, profiling and inspecting a running eXist-db instance.

ul.li: Send alerts only to receivers watching the affected instance
Store last ping status in db; send alerts only if status changed
New function console:dump prints all variables in the local variable stack, which are visible at the point the statement appears in the code.
Info popup in remote console causes browser display issues.
Fix eXist dependency to work with 3.0RC2 and final
Update console logging to match changes in internal eXist API
Add hipchat notifications
New "Tare" button in Query Profiling pane factors out external processes from results
Sync source with GitHub repository
Show version of Java in the Monitoring > System Information pane
Removed package's semver-max to ensure compatibility with all eXist 3.x releases
Upgraded included jetty jars to 9.4.6
Updated eXist dependency to require v3.5.0
Improved build process
Updated: Links to monex's GitHub repository - #39
Move jetty jars to eXist-db to prevent version conflicts
Improved compatibility with Tomcat 7 - #9
Improved resolution of dependencies during build and build documentation - #16
Removed old version warnings #51
Hotfix - #57
Choose shorter period for ping to keep the websocket connection open in Remote Console (was 5s, now .5s)
Fix release
